ovdesc.p: This module generates source code and catalogues the program of the report(s) specified in REPGEN.CREATE. In order to generate source, the report definition must be authorised.
Source code will be executed at run-time which can be on-line to satisy an ad-hoc request, or within an end-of-day job stream for such reports to be produced on a regular, scheduled basis.
The only allowed input in this module is on the action line in the format
where ID is the report name, i.e. the key to the file REPGEN.CREATE.
The time of the last compile is displayed and user is asked if he wishes to continue or not.
